text:
The following CVSROOT is specified at site/docs/dev/contributors.html:
:pserver:anoncvs@cvs.apache.org:/home/cvspublic:/home/cvspublic

It should be changed to:
:pserver:anoncvs@cvs.apache.org:/home/cvspublic
creator: joel.regen@activant.com
joel.regen@activant.com
text:
Created attachment 12745
patch to fix bug 31254

creator: jan@materne.de
text:
Searching for that site ...

Ant has:
* http://ant.apache.org/cvs.html
  cvs -d :pserver:anoncvs@cvs.apache.org:/home/cvspublic login
  which is correct
* http://ant.apache.org/contributors.html
  which has nothing to do with cvs access

So you mean http://www.apache.org/dev/contributors.html? I think so,
on http://www.apache.org/dev/contributors.html#cvsbasics that is written.

--8-<------8-<------8-<------8-<------8-<------8-<----
CVS data 
If you know what you're doing, all you need to know:

anonymous CVSROOT:
    :pserver:anoncvs@cvs.apache.org:/home/cvspublic:/home/cvspublic
viewcvs:
    http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/
--8-<------8-<------8-<------8-<------8-<------8-<----
    


That site is not maintained by Ant.
But I couldnt find a "Product" for that on the Bugzilla-Product-List.
I´ll bring that to our mailing list. Maybe one of the other knows how to handle 
that :) 

Thanks for filling out.

fixed in CVS, should become available online shortly.

As for product, I guess the infrastructure project in JIRA would have been the best
place http://nagoya.apache.org/jira/secure/BrowseProject.jspa?id=10410
creator: bodewig@apache.org
